ACQUISITION_REVOLT: Conquered as Leader of an Uprising
PERS_OPINION_DIFF_LOWER_THAN: Personal Opinion difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! lower than §Y$VAL$§!
PERS_OPINION_DIFF_AT_LEAST: Personal Opinion difference between §Y$FIRST$§! and §Y$SECOND$§! at least §Y$VAL$§!
EVTDESC38305: I have grown more trusting, accepting whatever fate has in store for me. I have lost the Paranoid trait.
EVTDESC38306: I have become aware of people's duplicity. I have lost the Trusting trait.
EVTDESC38307: I have suffered enough pain and betrayal. Why help those who hurt me back? I have lost the Kind trait.
EVTDESC38308: The wounds have marked me for life. I have gained the Scarred trait.
DIVORCE_INTERACTION_2: Divorce §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! for [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] proven unfaithfulness! [Recipient.GetPossPronounCap] close relatives will still be insulted (§R$OPINION$§! opinion)...
EVTOPTA301_DESC: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! is declared a legitimate [From.GetSonDaughter] with full inheritance rights.\n
EVTOPTB301_DESC: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! remains illegitimate, but is sanctioned as my [From.GetSonDaughter] and can be married off to form alliances. If [From.GetSubjectPronoun] ever has children, a new dynasty will be created for that line.\n
EVTOPTC301_DESC: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! is denounced as a bastard with an unknown father, having no official connection to me at all.\n
EVTDESC404_KF: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is pregnant and I can't possibly be the father! The realm is already astir with gossip - everyone knows [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] is the real father.
EVTDESC404_2: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] tells me she is pregnant, but that can't be right, can it?
EVTDESC21001: I have thought it over, and I cannot be the father of my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s baby. As it grows in her belly, I have trouble sleeping. I must put this matter to rest!
EVTDESC21003: The maid I paid to spy on my [GetFromRelation] has confirmed my suspicions - [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] is [From.GetFirstName]'s lover and the real father of the child!
EVTDESC21003_CR: The woman I hired to spy on my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has found out the shocking truth about her pregnancy. I was right, I am not the father... [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName] is, her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!
EVTOPTA21003: By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I had better keep this quiet!
EVTDESC21005: My [GetFromRelation] just stormed in, roaring and smashing chairs. He knows about my affair with [Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName]. He knows the child I carry is not his...
EVTDESC21006: [From.GetTitledName] knows about my affair with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. He knows the child she carries is actually mine...
EVTDESC21010: The maid I hired to gain my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]'s confidence has not found anything at all suspicious about her pregnancy.
EVTOPTB21010: I must KNOW. I will confront her directly!
EVTDESC21011: The spies I hired at great expense to discover anything suspicious about my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and her pregnancy have failed to turn up anything at all.
EVTOPTA21011: I guess the child must be mine then..?
EVTDESC21012: My dear [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is suspicious of my pregnancy. He is here right now asking me if the child is really his!
EVTOPTC21012: He's such a baby. Wrap him around my finger.
EVTDESC21013: [From.GetFirstName] started crying when I asked her if she's being unfaithful. She profusely ensures me of her undying love, virtue and steadfastness...
EVTDESC21003_CONF: When asked outright, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] broke down and tearfully admitted to having an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName], blubbering about mercy and forgiveness!
EVTDESC21003_CONF_CR: When asked outright, my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] broke down and tearfully admitted to having an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] - her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!
EVTDESC21015: [From.GetFirstName] got angry when I confronted her about the pregnancy, saying she lives in a prison and that I am denying her even the most basic freedoms...
EVTDESC21016: I found a note from my beloved [Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledFirstName] to meet him behind the smithy today, but it was my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] who waited for me there!
EVTDESC21003_TRAP: I planted a note in my [GetFromRelation]'s bedroom, instructing her to meet her lover behind the smithy. I stood there waiting, hoping she wouldn't come... but she did. She confessed to an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName]!
EVTDESC21003_TRAP_CR: I planted a note in my [GetFromRelation]'s bedroom, instructing her to meet her lover behind the smithy. She came alright, and brokenly confessed to an affair with [From.FatherOfUnborn.GetTitledName] - her own [GetFromVsFatherOfUnbornRelation]!
EVTTOOLTIP64046: [This.GetFirstName] and [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] break off their love affair
alert_no_focus_delayed: You should pick a Focus for your character
desc_wol_seducer_1: This character is learning the arts of attraction and the thrill of the chase...
desc_wol_seducer_2: This character is a well known seducer and heartbreaker.
desc_wol_court_tomcat: This man is a notorious tail chaser who runs circles around jealous husbands and lovers.
desc_wol_court_vixen: This lady is a notorious minx who knows all about outmanoeuvring jealous wives and lovers.
desc_wol_refused_duel: Challenged to an honorably duel, this character cravenly refused.
FOCUSABORTED_LETTER: My current situation prevents me from focusing on $FOCUS$.
focus_rulership_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] spends [This.GetPossPronoun] time and effort trying to govern well.
focus_business_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] fraternizes with burghers and merchants, seeking to unravel the enigma of gold.
focus_seduction_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] hones [This.GetPossPronoun] skills of attraction, for thrills and power. This Focus unlocks the §YSeduce§! option vs suitable targets.
focus_hunting_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] travels the realm making friends and killing off [This.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s creatures.
focus_war_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] engages in all things martial, from melee training to reading the works of ancient generals. This Focus unlocks the §YDuel§! action vs rivals and foes.
focus_carousing_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] strives to become more popular and outgoing by hosting wild parties. This Focus unlocks the §YInvite to Carousing§! option vs suitable targets.
focus_family_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] concentrates on family life, ensuring better relations between all family members.
focus_scholarship_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] buries [This.GetPossPronoun] nose in dusty old tomes, seeking knowledge and learning. Unlocks the §YBuild Observatory§! decision - the starting point for your studies.
focus_theology_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] leads a religious life of contemplation, prayer and meditation.
seduce_decision_desc: Focus your seduction efforts on §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! in the hopes of gaining a new lover...
seducer_desc: This man is a notorious rake and debaucher who leaves a trail of broken hearts - and bastards - in his wake.
seductress_desc: This woman is an infamous siren and temptress whose virtue is certainly in doubt...
administrator_desc: This character is a devoted administrator who loves order and efficiency above all things.
architect_desc: This character loves buildings, architecture and machinery, particularly anything related to siege warfare.
strategist_desc: This character loves planning campaigns and analyzing the current state of affairs.
socializer_desc: This character is committed to being well liked, and spends most spare time in the company of others.
schemer_desc: This character leads a life of intrigue and manipulation.
HAS_NO_OPINION_MOD: Does not have the '§Y$MOD$§!' Opinion of Anyone
EVTDESC_WOL_55: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! Lost in passion, they did not notice me, but I am still in shock!
EVTDESC_WOL_55_CR: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! I can't believe it... [GetFromVsFromFromRelation] and [GetFromFromVsFromRelation]! They did not notice me, but I am still in shock!
EVTDESC_WOL_55_M_HOMO: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] doing what man should not do to man! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
EVTDESC_WOL_55_F_HOMO: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] performing a very strange and intimate exercise... naked. They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
EVTDESC_WOL_55_PRIEST: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! A [From.GetManWoman] of God! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
EVTDESC_WOL_55_AGE_YOUNG: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! For shame, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] could be [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] [From.GetSonDaughter]! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
EVTDESC_WOL_55_AGE_OLD: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! For shame, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] could be [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] [From.GetFatherMother]! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock!
EVTDESC_WOL_55_F_MARRIED: Just the other day - skulking as I often do - I caught [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] in flagrante! They didn't notice me, but I am still in shock! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is a married [From.GetManWoman], by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
EVTOPTA_WOL_55_UNHOLY: Unholy sinners! They must be exposed!
EVTOPTB_WOL_55: The flesh is weak. Forgive and forget.
EVTDESC_WOL_56: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I know what you're doing with my [GetFromVsFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], you [GetFromRootInsult]. However, I understand the flesh is weak and would be willing to keep quiet about this affair for a small... donation.\n\n[From.GetBestName]
EVTDESC_WOL_56_CR: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I know what you and your [GetFromFromRelation] are doing, you [GetFromRootInsult]. While you both sicken me, I am in dire need of funds and would be willing to forget in return for a small donation.\n\n[From.GetBestName]
EVTDESC_WOL_56_HOMO: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. I've seen what you and my [GetFromVsFromFromRelation] are doing to each other, you [GetFromRootInsult]. Abomination! Yet, I am a kind [From.GetManWoman] and would be willing to forget in return for a small donation.\n\n[From.GetBestName]
EVTDESC_WOL_57: To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName]. Here, take my money. If you do not keep quiet, I will do things to you that you cannot even begin to imagine!\n\n[From.GetFirstName]
EVTDESC_WOL_59: To the [GetFromFromRootInsult] [Root.GetFirstName]. Is this some kind of sick jest? [From.GetFirstName]'s virtue is immaculate! Do what you will, no one will believe your lies anyway.\n\n[FromFrom.GetFirstName]
EVTOPTA_WOL_59: Very well. I will enjoy this!
EVTOPTB_WOL_59: It was worth a try, but I'm not that cruel.
EVTDESC_WOL_60: [From.GetBestName] has been telling everyone that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] saw me and [FromFrom.GetFirstName] making love. The scandal is a fact.
EVTOPTA_WOL_60_F: Poor [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. I didn't mean to hurt [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun].
EVTOPTA_WOL_60_M: Ah well. It is the Middle Ages!
EVTDESC_WOL_61: [FromFrom.GetBestName] has been telling everyone that [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] saw me and [From.GetFirstName] making love. The scandal is a fact.
EVTDESC_WOL_62: [FromFrom.GetBestName] has exposed an affair between my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]!
EVTDESC_WOL_63: [FromFromFrom.GetBestName] has exposed an affair between my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledName]!
EVTDESC_WOL_81_F: It isn't easy bedding every man who catches my fancy. Jealous wives, watchful mothers, meddling courtiers, unwanted pregnancies - it takes skill to navigate such treacherous waters!
EVTDESC_WOL_81_M: Chasing skirts can be a dangerous business. Jealous husbands, watchful parents, eavesdropping maids... little bastards. By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], it's a wonder I'm still alive!
EVTDESC_WOL_81_HOMO: In this benighted age, pursuing other [Root.GetMenWomen] is fraught with danger. Yet, the risk of scandal makes it all the more exciting. Besides, there's no risk of unwanted pregnancies!
EVTOPTA_WOL_81: I've learned a thing or two about Intrigue!
EVTDESC_WOL_99: My confidence is a mountain, my charm irresistible, my exploits legendary. I am [Root.GetFirstName] - temptation incarnate.
EVTOPTC_WOL_99: But... there are so many sins to explore!
EVTOPTD_WOL_99: Naturally, but I won't let vices define me.
EVTDESC_WOL_100: I shall bring all my seduction skills to bear on [From.GetTitledFirstName] until I have [From.GetObjectPronoun] wrapped around my finger!
EVTDESC_WOL_101: I have set my sights on [From.GetTitledFirstName], but the age difference could cause a bit of a scandal if the court gossips take notice of my efforts...
EVTTITLE_WOL_102: A Game for the Whole Family
EVTDESC_WOL_102: I have decided to seduce my own [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. The sheer taboo of it is thrilling, but the scandal... by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], the scandal would be epic.
EVTOPTA_WOL_102: The risk makes it even more exciting!
EVTOPTB_WOL_102: On second thought, I'm no deviant.
EVTDESC_WOL_103: The idea of seducing [From.GetTitledFirstName] - a [From.GetManWoman] of the cloth - is so exciting! Yet, I am definitely risking a scandal here...
EVTDESC_WOL_104: Society may take a dim view on my preferences, but at the risk of a scandal I am about to seduce [From.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTOPTB_WOL_104: It just isn't worth the risk.
EVTTOOLTIP_WoL_110: I start planning my next move
EVTDESC_WOL_111: The target of my seduction, [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], has tragically passed away!
EVTOPTA_WOL_111: Well, there are more fish in the sea!
EVTDESC_WOL_112: My seduction of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has come to an unexpected end, as [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] has ended up in prison!
EVTOPTA_WOL_112: I shall have get my thrills elsewhere
EVTDESC_WOL_113: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], the target of my amorous attentions, has tragically fallen comatose and is now entirely incapable of appreciating my efforts.
EVTOPTA_WOL_113: Seducing a vegetable is no challenge!
EVTDESC_WOL_200: Today I found a scented letter lying on my pillow. It appears [From.GetTitledFirstName] is quite smitten with me!
EVTDESC_WOL_200_CR: Today I found a scented letter lying on my pillow... I don't quite know how to react - it appears my own [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is quite smitten with me!
EVTDESC_WOL_201: I arranged for a scented love letter to be left on [From.GetFirstName]'s pillow in an attempt to woo [From.GetObjectPronoun]... and it seems to have struck true, for [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has left one on mine, confessing [From.GetPossPronoun] attraction to me!
EVTOPTA_WOL_201: Oho! Time to up the ante?
EVTOPTB_WOL_201: Great, but I no longer desire [From.GetObjectPronoun]
EVTDESC_WOL_202: [From.GetFirstName] has not responded to the love letter I had left on [From.GetPossPronoun] pillow.
EVTDESC_WOL_203: I arranged for a scented love letter to be left on [From.GetFirstName]'s pillow in an attempt to woo [From.GetObjectPronoun]... Today I found [From.GetPossPronoun] answering missive in the privy. It did not smell of roses.
EVTDESC_WOL_210: My bedroom is covered in wildflowers! And what's this? A beautiful necklace set with precious stones! There is a note here as well: 'From your humble admirer, [From.GetTitledFirstName], something to match your eyes'.
EVTDESC_WOL_210_CR: My bedroom is covered in wildflowers! And what's this? A beautiful necklace set with precious stones! There is a note here as well: 'From your humble admirer, [From.GetFirstName], something to match your eyes'. Wait, what, surely not my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]?!
EVTDESC_WOL_210_M: A page brought me a beautifully wrapped gift today - a perfectly balanced blade with a gilded hilt. The accompanying note says it's a gift from an admiring [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
EVTDESC_WOL_210_CR_M: A page brought me a beautifully wrapped gift today - a perfectly balanced blade with a gilded hilt. The accompanying note says it's a gift from an admiring [From.GetFirstName]! My own [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]?!
EVTDESC_WOL_211: I sent [From.GetFirstName] a beautiful necklace and had her room covered with wildflowers. The gambit seems to have paid off, for I found a magnificent new saddle with her embossed seal in the stables today!
EVTDESC_WOL_211_M: I sent [From.GetFirstName] a magnificent sword as a gift. It seems to have warmed his heart, for he sent me a matching dagger back!
EVTOPTB_WOL_211: I'm irresistible! But I've changed my mind...
EVTDESC_WOL_212: I sent [From.GetFirstName] a beautiful necklace and covered her room with wildflowers, but I've heard nothing back from her...
EVTDESC_WOL_212_M: I sent [From.GetFirstName] a magnificent sword as a gift, but all I got in return was silence.
EVTDESC_WOL_213: I sent [From.GetFirstName] a beautiful necklace and covered her room with wildflowers... Today I found my bed full of wilted petals and a bent, rusty nail on my pillow!
EVTDESC_WOL_213_M: Some time ago, I sent [From.GetFirstName] a magnificent sword as a gift. Today, I found it jammed into my loom, the weave completely ruined!
EVTOPTA_WOL_213: [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is feisty! I love a good challenge!
EVTOPTB_WOL_213: That's it, I'm wasting my talents!
EVTDESC_WOL_220: I didn't credit it when my maid claimed to have heard that [From.GetTitledFirstName] can't sleep because he's constantly thinking of me, but now all my friends are saying it too!
EVTDESC_WOL_220_CR: The chamber maid claims to have heard rumors that [From.GetTitledFirstName] can't sleep because he's constantly thinking about me... My own [GetFromRelation], bless [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
EVTDESC_WOL_220_M: I didn't credit it when my manservant claimed to have heard that [From.GetTitledFirstName] twists and turns at night in the grip of passionate dreams, crying out my name, but now my friends are saying it too!
EVTDESC_WOL_220_CR_M: I didn't credit it when my manservant claimed to have heard that [From.GetTitledFirstName] twists and turns at night in the grip of passionate dreams, crying out my name, but now my friends are saying it too! My own [GetFromRelation], by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
EVTOPTB_WOL_220: Unnatural! Why does this excite me?
EVTDESC_WOL_221: Some carefully placed words where they can easily be overheard by notorious gossips can be more effective than a love letter! [From.GetTitledFirstName] must have gotten my message, for I found a lock of hair wrapped in silk with [From.GetPossPronoun] personal seal in my chambers today.
EVTDESC_WOL_222: Some carefully placed words where they can easily be overheard by notorious gossips can be more effective than a love letter. Or so I thought, but my quarry, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has not responded in any way.
EVTDESC_WOL_223: I thought some carefully placed words where they could easily be overheard by notorious gossips would be more effective than a love letter... Well, [From.GetTitledFirstName] clearly got the message, for [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has started rumors of [From.GetPossPronoun] own about me!
EVTOPTA_WOL_223: Ingenious, but I won't give up so easily!
EVTOPTB_WOL_223: Me and a horse?! I've had it!
EVTDESC_WOL_300: My heart beats faster as [From.GetTitledName] grabs me for another dance. The hour is getting late, but the [From.GetManWoman] is such a charmer! I must be blushing like a beetroot.
EVTDESC_WOL_300_CR: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has danced with me all evening. I thought [From.GetSubjectPronoun] was just being sweet, but there is a strange tension growing between us. Something sensual, forbidden... thrilling.
EVTDESC_WOL_300_M: This minor event would be a dull affair, but [From.GetTitledName] just brushed her bosom against me again. Is she flirting with me..? That was definitely a wink! This is getting more interesting by the minute!
EVTOPTA_WOL_300_CR: Delicious sin! Lower my hands just a fraction...
EVTOPTB_WOL_300_MAR: I'm a married [Root.GetManWoman]! Take my leave.
EVTOPTB_WOL_300_OLD: [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is far too young for me!
EVTOPTB_WOL_300_YOUNG: [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is far too old for me!
EVTDESC_WOL_301: I made sure to attend this minor event in [From.Capital.Capital.GetName] so I could seduce [From.GetTitledFirstName]. We've been dancing and conversing all night and [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is clearly responding to my advances...
EVTDESC_WOL_301_DISTANT: I travelled all the way to the court of [From.Employer.GetTitledName] in [From.Capital.Capital.GetName] so I could meet [From.GetFirstName] at a minor celebration. We've been dancing and conversing all night and [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is clearly responding to my advances...
EVTOPTC_WOL_301: I'm affirmed. Now I can end this.
EVTDESC_WOL_302: I made sure to attend a minor event in [From.Capital.Capital.GetName] in the hopes of seducing [From.GetTitledFirstName], but despite my best attempts, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] remains unimpressed.
EVTDESC_WOL_303: As the festivities wind down, [From.GetFirstName] takes my hands and looks into my eyes. '[Root.GetMilordMilady], will you escort me to my chambers?'
EVTDESC_WOL_303_F: The night's merrymaking is coming to an end. [From.GetFirstName] nods towards my rather inebriated attendant. 'She won't even notice us leaving...' [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] grins lasciviously and pats me on the rump.
EVTOPTB_WOL_303: I am not that kind of [Root.GetLadLass]!
EVTDESC_WOL_304: What a night! I think I'm falling in love with [From.GetFirstName]...
EVTDESC_WOL_305: Just when things were really heating up, [From.GetFirstName] excused [From.GetReflexivePronoun] and left!
EVTDESC_WOL_306: I sure know how to cajole [From.GetMenWomen]! [From.GetFirstName] and I spent the night making sweet, illicit love in [From.GetPossPronoun] bed. I snuck off in the wee hours, leaving the court clueless... I hope!
EVTDESC_WOL_306_CR: I sure know how to cajole [From.GetMenWomen]! [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] will surely claim our souls for our wicked sin, but [From.GetFirstName] and I spent the night making sweet, illicit love in [From.GetPossPronoun] bed. I snuck off in the wee hours, leaving the court clueless... I hope!
EVTDESC_WOL_307: As the festivities wound down, I took [From.GetFirstName] aside and suggested we retire together... I can't believe [From.GetSubjectPronoun] actually spurned me!
EVTOPTA_WOL_307: The virtue is strong in this one...
EVTOPTB_WOL_307: I don't have the patience for this
EVTDESC_WOL_308: I thought I had [From.GetFirstName] completely entranced, but when I finally suggested we retire together, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] loudly mocked me and walked off with [From.GetPossPronoun] rather inebriated attendant, laughing cruelly!
EVTOPTB_WOL_308: I've had it with this harridan!
EVTOPTB_WOL_308_F: I've had it with this buffoon!
EVTDESC_WOL_351: I managed to 'chance' upon [From.GetFirstName] alone in the kitchen when [From.GetSubjectPronoun] came down for [From.GetPossPronoun] usual late snack. We've talked and laughed for hours and I can tell the attraction is growing. Hoping I've read [From.GetObjectPronoun] correctly, I lean in to whisper in [From.GetPossPronoun] ear...
EVTDESC_WOL_351_DISTANT: The journey to the court of [From.Employer.GetTitledName] was dreary, but I managed to 'chance' upon [From.GetFirstName] alone in the kitchen when [From.GetSubjectPronoun] came down for [From.GetPossPronoun] usual late snack. We've talked and laughed for hours and I can tell [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is attracted. Hoping I've read [From.GetObjectPronoun] correctly, I lean in to whisper in [From.GetPossPronoun] ear...
EVTOPTD_WOL_351: Brush my lips against [From.GetPossPronoun] ear and breathe out softly
EVTTOOLTIP_WoL_352_LOVE: Bet that [This.GetFirstName] is a naive romantic
EVTTOOLTIP_WoL_352_LEWD: Bet that [This.GetFirstName] is experienced and bawdy
EVTTOOLTIP_WoL_352_POET: Bet that [This.GetFirstName] will respond to poetry and learning
EVTTOOLTIP_WoL_352_BREATH: Use an unfailing trick of seduction
EVTDESC_WOL_352: As I snuck into the kitchen for my usual night snack, I chanced upon [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]. We've been chatting and laughing for hours now, but the words have grown softer and our hands are touching... Suddenly, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] leans in and whispers softly in my ear... [Root.GetSeductionAstrologyPostScript]
EVTDESC_WOL_352_DISTANT: As I snuck into the kitchen for my usual night snack, I chanced upon our distant guest, [From.GetTitledFirstName]. We've been chatting and laughing for hours now, but the words have grown softer and our hands are touching... Suddenly, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] leans in and whispers softly in my ear... [Root.GetSeductionAstrologyPostScript]
EVTDESC_WOL_352_HOMO: As I snuck into the kitchen for my usual night snack, I chanced upon [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]. We've been chatting and laughing for hours now, but there is a strange tension growing between us. Attraction? For another [From.GetManWoman]..?! EVTDESC_WOL_1039_WOUND: The duel with [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] was hard fought, but in the end I proved the better [Root.GetManWoman]. Though [From.GetSubjectPronoun] managed to cut me, I have proven my innocence and that of my [GetFromFromFromFromRelation] [FromFromFromFrom.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_WOL_1039_MAIM: [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] proved to be a formidable opponent. Though I won in the end, I lost three fingers and took several wounds in the process. I have proven my innocence and that of my [GetFromFromFromFromRelation] [FromFromFromFrom.GetFirstName]!
EVTDESC_WOL_1040: My valiant [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defeated my brutish [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] in a duel, thus proving our innocence.
EVTDESC_WOL_1040_WOUND: My valiant [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defeated and wounded my brutish [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] in a duel, thus proving our innocence.
EVTDESC_WOL_1040_MAIM: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defeated my [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] in a duel, cutting off his hand in the process. Our innocence has been proven.
EVTDESC_WOL_1040_DEATH: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] defended our honor by slaying my [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] in a duel. Our innocence has been proven.
EVTDESC_WOL_1041: I fought hard, full of righteous fury, yet [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] disarmed and defeated me in a fair duel, thus proving [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] innocence, and that of my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_WOL_1041_WOUND: I fought hard, full of righteous fury, yet [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] cut me again and again. Bleeding profusely, I had to yield. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has proven [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] innocence, and that of my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_WOL_1041_MAIM: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] cut me again and again, but I refused to yield. Suddenly, sun blinding me from the glare in [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] blade, [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] chopped my hand right off! [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has proven [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] innocence, and that of my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName].
EVTDESC_WOL_1041_DEATH: I fought [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] hard for what seemed like hours, but when my righteous fury gave way to exhaustion, [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] pierced my heart. Darkness descends.
EVTOPTA_WOL_1041: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has judged them fairly. [From.GetFirstName] forgive me.
EVTDESC_WOL_1102: I woke up this morning and realized that I have lost my feelings for my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal].
EVTOPTA_WOL_1102: Such is life. I should tell [From.GetObjectPronoun].
EVTOPTB_WOL_1102: We are [GetFromRelation] and [GetFromReverseRelation]. What need for love?
EVTDESC_WOL_1103: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has avoided me for some time now, and the rare occasions when we meet have turned from the nights of passion I remember to evenings of arguments and disagreement. It did not come as a shock when [From.GetSubjectPronoun] told me [From.GetSubjectPronoun] no longer loves me, but it hurt more than I thought it would.
EVTTOOLTIP_WoL_1104: [This.GetSheHeCap] is given a night [This.GetSubjectPronoun] won't soon forget!
EVTDESC_WOL_1104: I let [From.GetFirstName] know of my lost feelings for [From.GetObjectPronoun], and then [From.GetSubjectPronoun] goes and fills my room with flowers... and by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], what is [From.GetSubjectPronoun] wearing?!
EVTOPTA_WOL_1104: I love [From.GetObjectPronoun]! Or is it lust? Who cares!
EVTOPTB_WOL_1104: Sorry dear, it just doesn't do it for me.
EVTDESC_WOL_1105: I filled [From.GetFirstName]'s room with roses and waited on [From.GetPossPronoun] bed wearing... very little. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] was most impressed.
EVTDESC_WOL_1106: I filled [From.GetFirstName]'s room with roses and waited on [From.GetPossPronoun] bed wearing... very little. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] just sighed and went to sleep in another bedroom.
converts_to_castle: Will convert to §Y$NAME$§! when upgraded to a castle.
converts_to_city: Will convert to §Y$NAME$§! when upgraded to a city.
converts_to_temple: Will convert to §Y$NAME$§! when upgraded to a temple.
converts_to_tribal: Will convert to §Y$NAME$§! when upgraded to a tribal.
convert_settlement_to_castle: §Y$SETTLEMENT$§! will be upgraded to a castle.\n
convert_settlement_to_city: §Y$SETTLEMENT$§! will be upgraded to a city.\n
convert_settlement_to_temple: §Y$SETTLEMENT$§! will be upgraded to a temple.\n
convert_settlement_to_tribal: §Y$SETTLEMENT$§! will be upgraded to a tribe.\n
ALLOW_FREE_VICEROY_REVOKATION_ON: Revocation of viceroyalty duchy titles free\n
ALLOW_FREE_VICEROY_REVOKATION_OFF: Revocation of viceroyalty duchy titles no longer free\n
REVOKE_TITLE_INTERACTION_2J: Our Imperial administration allows us to revoke viceroyalty Duchies without objections from the aristocracy.
action_build_zeal_desc: Have your [GetLordSpiritualName] whip up religious zeal among the people, increasing your Piety and possibly even attracting some holy warriors. If you don't use these troops for religious wars, they will get angry at you and you will lose piety.
action_organize_raid_desc: Have your [GetMarshalName] gather men for a great raid, for plunder and glory! If you don't use these troops for raiding, they will get angry at you and take your gold instead.
action_build_legend_desc: Have your [GetTreasurerName] build your legend among the people, increasing your Prestige and possibly even raising some eager warriors. If you don't use these troops and go to war, they will get angry at you and you will lose prestige.
